review:
Yes it was year 1993 i visited dozens of dentists in Mumbai for my wisdom teeth which was giving me horrible pain every Dr said it's impossible to remove it bcoz it's totally bent it wil harm u & it's risky 
Asai reached Dr purnima parekh's dental clinic
After examining first word she said was it's v simple thing for me don't b affraid i wil do it 
I fixed th date of operation went to ghatkopar clinic
It took 1 hour i think so & everything was fine in evening in happy mood i was at my home 
U r grt grt grt Dr purnima parekh keep it up 
After long i found u & sending u a feedback from my heart
My experience is th best experience of my life i visited at Dr purnima parekh's dental clinic
A very experienced doctor. She did my tooth extraction with the least amount of pain.  Her follow up is also up to the mark. Highly recommended
When you go to someone who is so experienced, you can just tell right away. Dr. Parikh effortlessly removes my stubbornly crooked third molar...no post op pain or swelling. Thank you so much doc.

Horrible service *** ****** **** **** **** ****** ** ** ***** I wouldn't recommend Dr Parikh to anyone. I had taken my mother for severe tooth ache to her and she extracted the tooth ***** *** *** **** *** ******* ****** *** ********** *** **** ******* ****** ********** ***** ********* *** **** ** ****** *** ********* ****** ******* ** **** ******** ****** She was so horrified with the Covid situation she did not allow my mother to sit in the clinic post the extraction and asked us to leave *** *** *********** **** *** ***** ** *** ****** ******** *** ******* *** ** *** **** *** ***** ************* ********* For all of this she charged me ****** *** *** when I called her to give her feedback what she tells me in return is "Go do whatever you want". DO NOT VISIT her !!!
reply_text:
This patient was clearly informed the line of treatment and my charges before starting the extraction. At the end of the procedure, she was asked to wait in my consulting room instead of the reception room for social distancing as per Covid protocol. The patient’s health was observed for about 15 minutes before she left and the recovery was uneventful.  She was not asked to leave the clinic at any time. 

BTW this person’s daughter woke me up on three consecutive nights even prior to consultation (and without any reference) but was politely advised on each instance and no night consultation charges were asked for.

Such a disheartening feedback discourages a doctor to go out of the way and help new patients without references.
